main.name: Prachit Patil
main.description: I am a Full Stack Developer and I use react, node and python to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I am a Full Stack developer and I love to learn new things. I believe that every programmer is an author in a unique way. I love football, gaming, and swimming. I carry my dream to travel around the world
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers
